Plot: A deceased billionaire leaves his spoiled adult grandson a series of odd tasks to perform in order to receive "the ultimate gift," with the resentful grandson having no idea what that might be.
Title: The Ultimate Gift
Actors: James Garner, Bill Cobbs, Lee Meriwether, George Lee
tomatoConsensus: Though The Ultimate Gift avoids religious speechifying like other Fox Faith films, it's dramatically inert with flat direction.
